# cho-tab-item-content



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute | Description                                      | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `index` _(required)_ | `index`   | The position index of the tab content.           | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `visible`            | `visible` | If `true`, the tab item content will be visible. | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                               |
| ---- | ----------------------------------------- |
|      | The main content of the tab item content. |
